CategoricalHyperParameterRange.description: Provides the name and values of a Categorical hyperparameter.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the hyperparameter.

type.description: The name of the hyperparameter.

properties.name: Values
properties.description: A list of the categories for the hyperparameter.

type.description: A list of the categories for the hyperparameter.

ContinuousHyperParameterRange.description: Provides the name and range of a continuous hyperparameter.

properties.name: MaxValue
properties.description: The maximum allowable value for the hyperparameter.

type.description: The maximum allowable value for the hyperparameter.

properties.name: MinValue
properties.description: The minimum allowable value for the hyperparameter.

type.description: The minimum allowable value for the hyperparameter.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the hyperparameter.

type.description: The name of the hyperparameter.

IntegerHyperParameterRange.description: Provides the name and range of an integer-valued hyperparameter.

properties.name: MaxValue
properties.description: The maximum allowable value for the hyperparameter.

type.description: The maximum allowable value for the hyperparameter.

properties.name: MinValue
properties.description: The minimum allowable value for the hyperparameter.

type.description: The minimum allowable value for the hyperparameter.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the hyperparameter.

type.description: The name of the hyperparameter.

SolutionConfig.description: The configuration to use with the solution. When performAutoML is set to true, Amazon Personalize only evaluates the autoMLConfig section of the solution configuration.

properties.name: AlgorithmHyperParameters
properties.description: Lists the hyperparameter names and ranges.

type.description: Lists the hyperparameter names and ranges.

properties.name: AutoMLConfig
properties.description: The AutoMLConfig object containing a list of recipes to search when AutoML is performed.

type.description: The AutoMLConfig object containing a list of recipes to search when AutoML is performed.

properties.name: MetricName
properties.description: The metric to optimize.

type.description: The metric to optimize.

properties.name: RecipeList
properties.description: The list of candidate recipes.

type.description: The list of candidate recipes.

properties.name: EventValueThreshold
properties.description: Only events with a value greater than or equal to this threshold are used for training a model.

type.description: Only events with a value greater than or equal to this threshold are used for training a model.

properties.name: FeatureTransformationParameters
properties.description: Lists the feature transformation parameters.

type.description: Lists the feature transformation parameters.

properties.name: HpoConfig
properties.description: Describes the properties for hyperparameter optimization (HPO)

type.description: Describes the properties for hyperparameter optimization (HPO)

properties.name: AlgorithmHyperParameterRanges
properties.description: The hyperparameters and their allowable ranges

type.description: The hyperparameters and their allowable ranges

properties.name: CategoricalHyperParameterRanges
properties.description: The categorical hyperparameters and their ranges.

type.description: The categorical hyperparameters and their ranges.

properties.name: ContinuousHyperParameterRanges
properties.description: The continuous hyperparameters and their ranges.

type.description: The continuous hyperparameters and their ranges.

properties.name: IntegerHyperParameterRanges
properties.description: The integer hyperparameters and their ranges.

type.description: The integer hyperparameters and their ranges.

properties.name: HpoObjective
properties.description: The metric to optimize during HPO.

type.description: The metric to optimize during HPO.

properties.name: MetricName
properties.description: The name of the metric

type.description: The name of the metric

properties.name: MetricRegex
properties.description: A regular expression for finding the metric in the training job logs.

type.description: A regular expression for finding the metric in the training job logs.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: The type of the metric. Valid values are Maximize and Minimize.

type.description: The type of the metric. Valid values are Maximize and Minimize.

properties.name: HpoResourceConfig
properties.description: Describes the resource configuration for hyperparameter optimization (HPO).

type.description: Describes the resource configuration for hyperparameter optimization (HPO).

properties.name: MaxNumberOfTrainingJobs
properties.description: The maximum number of training jobs when you create a solution version. The maximum value for maxNumberOfTrainingJobs is 40.

type.description: The maximum number of training jobs when you create a solution version. The maximum value for maxNumberOfTrainingJobs is 40.

properties.name: MaxParallelTrainingJobs
properties.description: The maximum number of parallel training jobs when you create a solution version. The maximum value for maxParallelTrainingJobs is 10.

type.description: The maximum number of parallel training jobs when you create a solution version. The maximum value for maxParallelTrainingJobs is 10.

properties.name: DatasetGroupArn
properties.description: The ARN of the dataset group that provides the training data.

type.description: The ARN of the dataset group that provides the training data.

properties.name: EventType
properties.description: When your have multiple event types (using an EVENT_TYPE schema field), this parameter specifies which event type (for example, 'click' or 'like') is used for training the model. If you do not provide an eventType, Amazon Personalize will use all interactions for training with equal weight regardless of type.

type.description: When your have multiple event types (using an EVENT_TYPE schema field), this parameter specifies which event type (for example, 'click' or 'like') is used for training the model. If you do not provide an eventType, Amazon Personalize will use all interactions for training with equal weight regardless of type.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name for the solution

type.description: The name for the solution

properties.name: PerformAutoML
properties.description: Whether to perform automated machine learning (AutoML). The default is false. For this case, you must specify recipeArn.

type.description: Whether to perform automated machine learning (AutoML). The default is false. For this case, you must specify recipeArn.

properties.name: PerformHPO
properties.description: Whether to perform hyperparameter optimization (HPO) on the specified or selected recipe. The default is false. When performing AutoML, this parameter is always true and you should not set it to false.

type.description: Whether to perform hyperparameter optimization (HPO) on the specified or selected recipe. The default is false. When performing AutoML, this parameter is always true and you should not set it to false.

properties.name: RecipeArn
properties.description: The ARN of the recipe to use for model training. Only specified when performAutoML is false.

type.description: The ARN of the recipe to use for model training. Only specified when performAutoML is false.
